file_content.text: Trade operation successful.
Trade system error.
You are already trading.
<<1>> is already trading.
You are not currently involved in a trading session.
Your trading session has been canceled because <<1>> left.
You have canceled your trading session.
The trading session has been canceled by <<1>>.
<<1>> declined your offer to trade.
You do not have <<1>> credits to trade.
You cannot trade <<1>>.
<<1>> has altered the deal. Pray <<p:1>> does not alter it any further.
You do not have enough inventory space to complete the trade.
<<1>> does not have enough inventory space to complete the trade.
<<1>> no longer has enough credits.
You cannot trade with <<1>>.
<<1>> is not currently accepting trades.
You are too far away to trade with <<1>>.
The dead cannot trade.
Trading is not allowed during combat.
You must remain close to <<1>> to trade.
You must wait a few seconds before sending another trade request.
Your trading session has been canceled due to the untimely death of <<1>>.
<<1>> is too busy to trade.
You have invited <<1>> to trade.
Auto-declining trade invite from <<1>>...
<<1>> has invited you to trade.
You declined the trade invite from <<1>>.
You cannot use that until it is traded to you.
You cannot use that while you are trading it.
You cannot use that while you are mailing it.
You cannot use that while you are auctioning it.
You cannot use that right now.
Secure Trade Completed
Target not in phase.
Free-to-Play players may not participate in trades. Items may be mailed instead.
Secure Trade
Only Subscribers and Preferred Status Players may participate in Secure Trade.
Become a Subscriber or Preferred Status Player to begin trading!
As a Preferred Status Player you may not use Secure Trade until level <<1>>.
You may not trade with this player until they are level <<1>>. Items may be mailed instead.
You may not trade this item because it has been opened.
You cannot trade with yourself.
